missionProperties.repositionOverride: Be on or adjacent to the closest terminal with the fewest Imperial figures on or adjacent to it.

events.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: An old supply crate.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: An old supply crate.

events.eventText:
You approach the makeshift transmission center where the Imperials are uploading the coordinates.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} The doors leading into the transmission center are locked.

eventActions.tbText: Obi-Wan, who has been accompanying you in silence the entire time, pauses. "We must be cautious," the wise old Jedi says. "Imperial stormtroopers patrol the perimeter."
"There will be security consoles that control the doors," Obi-Wan continues.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The security station is rusty and weathered, but still operational.

{-} If there are no Imperial figures on or adjacent to a terminal, a Rebel figure can interact with that terminal to deactivate it.

The security station is rusty and weathered, but still operational.

{-} If there are no Imperial figures on or adjacent to a terminal, a Rebel figure can interact with that terminal to deactivate it.

The security station is rusty and weathered, but still operational.

{-} If there are no Imperial figures on or adjacent to a terminal, a Rebel figure can interact with that terminal to deactivate it.

eventActions.tbText:
{-} If there are no Imperial figures on or adjacent to a terminal, a Rebel figure can interact with that terminal to deactivate it.
{-} When all terminals are deactivated, both locked doors open.

"We should not linger for too long. May the Force be with us." Obi-Wan says. He walks forward toward the center, igniting his lightsaber.

{-} The mission will progress when the doors open.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.theText:
{-} The doors leading into the transmission center are locked.
{-} If there are no Imperial figures on or adjacent to a terminal, a Rebel figure can interact with that terminal to deactivate it.
{-} When all terminals are deactivated, both locked doors open.
{-} The mission will progress when the doors open.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText:
The final relay station sputters and sparks as you destroy it. As its power fizzles, you see on the view screen that the transmission did not complete. You round up and detain the remaining Imperials, ensuring that Obi-Wan's secret location will remain safe.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Heroes receive <color="red">Obi-Wan Kenobi</color> (Jedi Knight) as an ally.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

Retreating from the transmission center, you hear the ominous tone from the relay stations indicating that the data transfer has completed. Troops bear down on your position. You throw yourself in their path as Obi-Wan makes his escape, but it will be hard to keep him safe for long.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.
You punch in the entry code, deactivating one of the security stations.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The security station is rusty and weathered, but still operational.

{-} If there are no Imperial figures on or adjacent to a terminal, a Rebel figure can interact with that terminal to deactivate it.

events.eventText: You punch in the entry code, deactivating one of the security stations.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The security station is rusty and weathered, but still operational.

{-} If there are no Imperial figures on or adjacent to a terminal, a Rebel figure can interact with that terminal to deactivate it.

events.eventText: With the final entry code input, the security overrides shut down, and the doors slide open.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
A blast door leads into the makeshift transmission center.

{-} The door is locked.
{-} When all terminals are deactivated, both locked doors open.

A blast door leads into the makeshift transmission center.

{-} The door is locked.
{-} When all terminals are deactivated, both locked doors open.

eventActions.tbText: An officer shouts orders to his guards, "They're here! Protect the relay stations!" A pair of guards activate their force pikes and steps toward you.
You can see one of the relay stations, but there have to be more around. You need to find them all.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
Data is spooling across the relay station's screen as it transmits information to the Imperial fleet.

{-} A Rebel figure can attack a relay station (Health: *1*, Defense: 2 {G}).

eventActions.tbText:
{-} Mission tokens represent relay stations. A Rebel figure can attack a relay station (Health: *1*, Defense: 2 {G}).
{-} The Rebels win when all relay stations are destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.
The internal defenses activate, and the remaining external Imperials close in around you.

eventActions.repositionText: Block line of sight to the relay stations.

eventActions.shortText: Find and destroy the relay stations (&Relais Stations&/3).

eventActions.theText:
{-} Mission tokens represent relay stations. A Rebel figure can attack a relay station (Health: *1*, Defense: 2 {G}).
{-} The Rebels win when all relay stations are destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText: Alarms blare through the transmission center.

Heavy locks slide over the closed doors.

{-} Doors are locked. A hero can interact with a door ({I}) to try and open it.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
Behind the simple door, the hum of electricity can be heard.

{-} The door is locked. A hero can interact with a door ({I}) to try and open it.

Behind the simple door, the hum of electricity can be heard.

{-} The door is locked. A hero can interact with a door ({I}) to try and open it.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Doors are locked. A hero can interact with a door ({I}) to try and open it.
{-} Mission tokens represent relay stations. A Rebel figure can attack a relay station (Health: *1*, Defense: 2 {G}).
{-} The Rebels win when all relay stations are destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText:
Energy shields activate around the relay stations.

{-} Each relay station has +1 Health.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
Data is spooling across the relay station's screen as it transmits information to the Imperial fleet. The station is surrounded by an energy shield.

{-} A Rebel figure can attack a relay station (Health: *1*+1, Defense: 2 {G}).

eventActions.tbText:
<color="red">Hidden</color> charges at the door frames detonate, sending shrapnel everywhere.

{-} Roll 1 green die. Each Rebel figure on a red highlighted space suffers {H} equal to the {H} results.

events.eventText: The relay station collapses in a shower of sparks.

eventActions.mainText:
You start picking the lock. 

{-} Test {I}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the door, then discard all strain tokens on the door. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText: You don't make any progress. You need to keep trying.

events.eventText: The door slides open, revealing a tiny room with a relay station inside.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: Behind the simple door, the hum of electricity can be heard.

eventActions.mainText:
You start picking the lock. 

{-} Test {I}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the door, then discard all strain tokens on the door. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText: You don't make any progress. You need to keep trying.

events.eventText: The door opens into a small cabinet with a relay station.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: Behind the simple door, the hum of electricity can be heard.
